title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Reimagining Public Sector with AWS Partner generative AI solutions (WPS203)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 利用AWS合作伙伴生成式AI解决方案重新构想公共部门 (WPS203)
abstract: Generative AI is reshaping how public sector organizations deliver on their missions. In this session, discover practical approaches to adopting GenAI securely and effectively, guided by solutions from AWS Partners. We’ll explore four key pathways: weaving AI securely into your organization, preventing data loss with trusted controls, accelerating adoption through embedded AI, and solving complex business problems with partner-built solutions. Whether you’re just getting started or looking to scale, you’ll gain a roadmap for harnessing generative AI to drive impact across your agency or institution.
abstract_cn: 生成式人工智能正在重塑公共部门组织履行其使命的方式。在本次会议中，您将了解在AWS合作伙伴解决方案的指导下，安全有效地采用生成式AI的实用方法。我们将探讨四个关键路径：将AI安全地融入您的组织、通过可信控制防止数据丢失、通过嵌入式AI加速采用，以及利用合作伙伴构建的解决方案解决复杂的业务问题。无论您是刚刚起步还是希望扩大规模，您都将获得一份路线图，帮助您利用生成式AI在您的机构或组织中推动影响力。
